column2: Discloses how the company works to identify human rights and environmental risks, impacts and violations in its supply chain (its approach to conducting due diligence)
column3: Discloses how worker/producer/farmer representatives, unions and other affected stakeholders are involved in the due diligence process
column4: Discloses how women workers, women's organisations, women human rights defenders and gender experts in all stages of human rights due diligence
column5: Discloses the salient human rights and environmental risks, impacts and violations identified
column6: Discloses evidence of steps taken to cease, prevent, mitigate and remedy human rights and environmental risks, impacts and violations identified
column7: Discloses the outcomes or results of steps taken to cease, prevent, mitigate and remedy human rights and environmental risks, impacts and violations identified
